Likewise on the question of troop levels, Donald Rumsfeld makes a minor concession while dodging the larger point. - SAN FRANCISCO( Reuters)- Chrysler Group LLC's chief executive apologized on Saturday for describing the high-interest bailout loans extended by the U.S. and Canadian governments in 2009 as`` shyster loans.'' Yesterday, in responding to a question about Chrysler's government loans, I used a term in reference to the interest rate being charged on our government loans that has raised concern, CEO Sergio Marchionne said in a statement.`` I regret the remark which I consider inappropriate.'' shake-up. Current Google CEO Eric Schmidt will serve as the company's executive chairman. Co-founder Sergey Brin will devote his time to strategic projects, in particular working on new products, the company said. We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time, Eric Schmidt said in a statement.`` By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company.
